text: o visvasulara! Miru balavantanga strilaku varasulu kavatam miku dharmasam'matam kadu. Mariyu miru varikiccina dani (mahr) nundi konta tisukovataniki varini ibbandilo pettakandi, varu nis'sandehanga vyabhicaraniki palpadite tappa. Mariyu miru varito gauravanto sahavasam ceyandi. Okavela miku varu naccakapote! Bahusa miku oka visayam naccakapovaccu, kani andulone allah ento melu unci undavaccu
